TopicTitle: Ask a question; Get a clever answer back!

Articles.Content:
I got the idea a while ago after looking at this thread, but decided only now to post it. You know the drill: follow all forum rules as usual so we won't get a flaming horde of angry villagers with torches and pitchforks!

Also, remember: Puns are perfectly acceptable, and images are welcome!

Now for an example:

PersonA: "Why Is the waiter taking so long to get here?"

----

PersonB: "Do you think they're called waiters because of their hastiness? They'd be called "go-ers" if they were fast!"

"What does the fox say?"

----

Person:C "Nothing. They don't have a spoken language."

...and so on...

Now that I think about it, this sounds kind of like BAHfest or Uncyclopedia.

Since this requires some thinking and a reasonable amount of writing, it doesn't matter if you get ninja'd. just write a second response to the next person too and continue as if it never happened.

I'll start this with... "What is the largest organ in the human body?"

Edited September 17, 2015 by NeatCrown

The skin, because it's large enough to hold everything else.

Where do birds go when it rains?

The skin, because it's large enough to hold everything else.

Where do birds go when it rains?

Why don't you ask the birds?

Why is 1.1 a bigger update than 1.0?

You don't know? It's because: v*1.1>v*1

(Ah, Mike's post reminded me about that xkcd comic.)

What is in the centre of a black hole?

Edited September 16, 2015 by NeatCrown

Two black halves. Duh...

What is pie?

Something a math professor eats for desert...

Why do donuts have holes???

Because they're holy. Ahahahahaha... get it... Hole-y... and donuts are good things so they're holy.. Okay, no.

Why are black boxes called black? They're orange!
Racism.

Because they kare-osine about each other. (Fools/fuels)

I am beginning to regret making that horrible pun

Has the Large Hadron Collider destroyed the world yet?

Edited September 16, 2015 by NeatCrown

Let me refer you to the fact that you are asking that question.

How do I get into orbit?

You get enough horizontal speed in the right direction.

What's the delta-v required for a bi-elliptic transfer from LKO to Saturn using Venus as a gravitational assist?

None if you have the right initial velocity.

How do I get into space?

Build rocket, point right end towards space, ignite stage and wait. You won't go orbital, but maybe your rocket is powerful enough to put you in a suborbital path. Still counts as space!

When thinking about the phrase "Moar Boostar", what can a human do?

Build rocket, point right end towards space, ignite stage and wait. You won't go orbital, but maybe your rocket is powerful enough to put you in a suborbital path. Still counts as space!

When thinking about the phrase "Moar Boostar", what can a human do?

Call the cops.

How do I kill jebediah?

Dont. Ever. Kill. Jeb.

Why does my heart skip a crazy beat?

Modify him in to a Kerballistic weapon. (To Clift)

Because you've got arrhythmia. (to Dman, because I was ninja'd)

What's the fastest organism?

Edited September 17, 2015 by NeatCrown

A kerbal, they can live with intinite gees.

What is the average airspeed of a maiden swallow?

Do you mean an"unladen swallow"? Because if not then that's another type of swallow to take into account making the question even harder.

Why is my rocket not going to space?

Because you're going to HECK!

How does life change over time?

I ran the numbers.

We'll use X for Life.

x = Change (I have 37 cents in my pocket)* time (it's currently 1351Z).

That gives you a change 49 o'clock.98 minutes to the power 7 seconds. If you had more change, you'd have more life. Because Time = Money. Lots of Change = Money. So clearly for more Life, we need more Time. Because more Time gives more Money.

If Barry has 36 pineapples, 1 litre of white rum, 2 litres of capn' morgan. How many friends does Barry have?

None; Barry belongs to a religion which prohibits alcohol.

What is imagination?

A sky of trains among the stars where everyone eats pizza but physics are different so people can eat all they want and nothing bad ever happens. See what I did there?

Why is 42 the answer to everything?

Because of the Bum's Guide to the Galaxy

Why BBC?

Because everything is better with crumpets...

Speaking of the BBC...

Dr. Who????

That is a classified topic and shal not be spoken of again.

How do I create a snack monopoly?
